pages.text: The Flute is an item that will let you summon all non sitting pets that are around you. One can also right or left click a pet with a Flute to bind the item to said pet.$(br2)A bound Flute will then only summon that specific pet, this time regardless if it's sitting or not only if the pet if it is within 64 blocks to you..
